Reset all rolling monitored shows that have been inactive for a specified number of days

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={undefined}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={{"content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","properties":{"inactivityDays":{"type":"number","minimum":1,"maximum":365}},"additionalProperties":false}}}}}
>
  
</RequestSchema>

  id={undefined}
